item.title: One of the wildest chip stocks reports earnings after the bell. What analysts are thinking
item.description: Analysts anticipate continued strength in the company's chips business as pricing and demand improves in the latter half of this year.

item.title: Steady stocks that beat the market during rough times, according to Bank of America
item.description: Bank of America analysts compiled a list of stocks that have outperformed prior market pullbacks at least 80% of the time.
